CustomField.formula: IF(!ISBLANK(vc_status__c),vc_status__c, IF(ISBLANK(First_Quote_Date__c) && ISBLANK(Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c),"Contact", IF(!ISBLANK(First_Quote_Date__c) && ISBLANK(Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c),"Quoter", Customer_Status_HS__c))) & IF(!ISBLANK(vc_status__c) || (ISBLANK(Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c)), "", IF( Today()- Contact_s_Date_of_First_Order__c <= 365," - New"," - Retention"))
CustomField.label: Customer Status Bar
